resources.string: After his father\'s death, T\'Challa returns home to Wakanda to inherit his throne. However, a powerful enemy related to his family threatens to attack his nation.
A group of west coast kids facing their last days together before a development paves over their homes stumble onto evidence of pirate\'s treasure attracting the attention of a family of criminals.
A new order threatens to destroy the New Republic. Finn, Rey and Poe, backed by the Resistance and the Republic, must find a way to stop them and find Luke, the last surviving Jedi.
